title: A.1 Summation Formulas and Properties
content:
Section A.1

Summation Formulas and Properties

Summary

Essential summation formulas used throughout algorithm analysis.

Key Points

  • Arithmetic: Σᵢ₌₁ⁿ i = n(n+1)/2
  • Squares: Σᵢ₌₁ⁿ i² = n(n+1)(2n+1)/6
  • Geometric: Σᵢ₌₀ⁿ xⁱ = (xⁿ⁺¹-1)/(x-1)
  • Harmonic: Hₙ = Σᵢ₌₁ⁿ 1/i = ln n + O(1)
  • Linearity: Σ(af + bg) = aΣf + bΣg

Example

Sum 1+2+...+100 = 100·101/2 = 5050. Σᵢ₌₀^∞ (1/2)ⁱ = 2.

Why It Matters

These formulas appear constantly in algorithm analysis.
